website_summaries.verdict: This cream almost lives up to its promise to lift your skin in one day. Try it if firming your skin is a priority.
pros: Photo-Activated LiftComplex boosts the skin on your face and neck to make it look plump, soft and smooth
Some see results in as little as one day
Refreshes your skin, making it very soft
cons: It could do more to improve the appearance of lines on the neck

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product  - Damaged skin on face!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Estee Lauder Resilience Lift Firming/Sculpting Face and Neck Creme for years. This cream was not the same product as advertised. It caused red, burning swollen face after 1 use. Had to go to dermatologist to get medication to heal my face. Dr is sending product to lab for identifying what was sold to me. $200 Dr. bill and pain is NOT worth the so called savings on my face cream. The party selling should be prosecuted for fraud.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Rutmanis

customer_reviews.title: Product is sold past the expiration date
customer_reviews.text: It was my only moisturizer for face. Then it was replaced with a new product with new ingredients. The new product did not work for me. When I found it online I ordered 2 jars of Resilience Lift. When it arrived it was so old that it was no longer creamy. It actually curdled on the face. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: This is really great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical when I ordered this because the price was much less than at the counter, but it is exactly as advertised. EL Resilience Lift has been a must for me for many years because of its uplifting and tightening qualities. Definitely plan to order again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy English

customer_reviews.title: moisture
customer_reviews.text: Have used this cream for years and love it. It's moisture qualities are excellent. I use it before makeup and at bedtime. It is a good product. I always uses Estee Lauder products.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Cream is light
customer_reviews.text: I definitely saw a subtle improvement. The cream is light and easy absorbs into skin with out feeling oily
customer_reviews.author: laura herdling

customer_reviews.title: Soft and silky
customer_reviews.text: Non greasy. It's been my favorite for years. I've tried others. But, nothing else compared.
customer_reviews.author: Realvalady

customer_reviews.title: Needs More Research -Heck No
customer_reviews.text: NEVER AGAIN...Burns my eyes...No No No..name brand for nothing. Go do more research. Smh!
customer_reviews.author: A’mari “DJ Mona-Lisa”

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Great price. I just hope its real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenija Roye

customer_reviews.title: Read ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute FAVORITE moisturizer, but the box and the jar says "not for sale" - and its really sad a company is selling a product they received for free. I will not and have not purchased the product again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Resilience Lift...we hardly knew ye.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike immensely that the product is being discontinued!!!!!! Could only find it at Amazon. Lauder should be ashamed of herself.
customer_reviews.author: Sweater lover

customer_reviews.title: Estee Lauder Keeps Me Young.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years and it keeps me looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: wonderful product ..tightens and smooths skin. product was ordered and delivered on time , awesome service
customer_reviews.author: Carolann Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I love Estee Lauder creams and such. They always leave my skin moisturized and feeling fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: TCarollo

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to an in=law. She uses this every AM and PM. It's an awesome, amazing moisturizer with a fantastic price and very fast delivery, In fact, I'm about to order more!!
customer_reviews.author: netshopper454

customer_reviews.title: It sayo not for sale and no expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: It looks that these products are samples it indicates that are not intended for individual sale. Not for sale. I am considering to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not good.
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to be old. It isn’t moist like it is when I buy it from a department store.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Douglas

customer_reviews.title: leaves skin soft and hydrated
customer_reviews.text: I used Resilience lift in the morning under my makeup. Makeup went on easily and my face looked soft and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product on the market for "lift" and moisterizing.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and it is always consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Ashe

customer_reviews.title: ohhh, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend, came in record time and was a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M. Abell, it's me

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this item! It was half the price of zwhat I normally pay
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My mom of 79 looks great due to using this daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ruthman

customer_reviews.title: Mom Liked It...
customer_reviews.text: Order it for my 83 year old Mom she loves the stuff said it would of cost twice as much or more at Macy's...
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Natural Feeling and Great at Smoothing Neck
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin which will break out or turn red with many skin lotions. This one is great. Goes on smooth and looks great. You only need a small amount. I use it only on my neck, but it is also for the face.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - it’s used
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of lauder and the resistance lift.. definitely buy but not from this seller
customer_reviews.author: High Energy

customer_reviews.title: Cream must be very old.
customer_reviews.text: Has the consistency of putty not creamy at all. I have used this product for years. I am not going to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo mazzella

customer_reviews.title: It was good, smells great and is creamy
customer_reviews.text: It was good ,smells great and is creamy.Does it lift??
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Gore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love the silky feel and it has a very low fragrance!
customer_reviews.author: CRR

product_meta.title: Estee Lauder Resilience Lift Firming/Sculpting Face and Neck Creme SPF 15 Normal/Combination Skin, 1 oz
feature_bullets: Creme lifts and firms skin while restoring radiance.
